name: Help I dropped my laptop and my steam library got mixed what do I do
name_original: Help I dropped my laptop and my steam library got mixed what do I do
description:
Please make sure to play in full screen! (1920 x 1080 recommended) How to Play

Survive for as long as possible while doing minigames that get harder as time passes. You are allowed up to 5 mistakes. In case you forget the controls, there are reminders at the top left of the screen as well!

  • Side scrolling space shooter: Move with your mouse, shoot with left click. Enemy ships take 1 hit to destroy, asteroids take 3.
  • Mouse dodging game: Dodge the yellow dumbfire missiles and red homing missiles using your mouse. 
  • Aim trainer: Press all buttons before time runs out.
  • Typing: Type the 2 randomly generated words before time runs out.
  • Sorting game: left/right click to sort the circles and triangles, respectively.
Credits and stuff
  • Music is from http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=1345&genre=Eight
  • Everything else  is done by me!
    • Art made with paint.net
    • Sound effects generated using sfxr
    • Made in unity
  • No I don't think the game is possible past ~2:30
  • I might add more minigames post-jam so if you have any ideas or if you find any bugs feel free to let me know!
